name: Rapidmon
effect: ＜Armor Purge＞ (When this Digimon would be deleted, you may trash the top card of this Digimon to prevent that deletion.)[When Digivolving] Suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon for each Tamer you have in play. Then, up to 3 of your opponent's suspended Digimon get -5000 DP for the turn.
